home.title: Front-End Web Developer
home.introPara: An expert Front-end Developer based in Mumbai, India

about.aboutSect: Hi, I'm Mohd Affan, a passionate self-taught Frontend Developer specializing in React.js. My journey into web development began with a curiosity to create dynamic and visually appealing websites. I have honed my skills in JavaScript, React, Tailwind CSS, and Sass, and I’m currently exploring Next.js and Redux Toolkit to expand my expertise. I enjoy turning ideas into reality through clean, responsive, and user-friendly interfaces. My goal is to constantly learn and stay updated with the latest technologies in the ever-evolving web development field. I'm eager to collaborate on exciting projects and bring creative solutions to life. When I'm not coding, you’ll find me exploring new technologies or working on personal projects to sharpen my skills.
